meanings.definition: Covered in or decorated with flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden looked even flowerier after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was flowerier than anyone else's at the party.
meanings.sent3: The room was so flowerier that it felt like a floral explosion!
meanings.sent4: The meadow was a flowerier paradise, a sea of colorful blooms.
meanings.sent5: The flowerier decorations brightened up the entire venue.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or excessive floral scent.
meanings.sent1: The perfume she wore was flowerier than any other.
meanings.sent2: The air in the garden was flowerier than usual, filled with the scent of roses.
meanings.sent3: The room was so flowerier with fragrance that it made everyone sneeze!
meanings.sent4: The flowerier aroma of the garden enveloped her like a fragrant cloud.
meanings.sent5: The flowerier scent of the candles created a calming atmosphere in the room.
